concern: Does anyone know of any good iphone apps/websites for students that help keep organized and maybe even assignment reminders? I know notion is a popular website but for some reason I just can’t get the hang of it.

dialogue_total.statement: Hi there! What's on your mind today? Is there anything specific you'd like to talk about or explore?

I'm having trouble staying organized with my school assignments and need some advice on managing them better. I'd like to discuss simple strategies or tools that could help me feel more on top of things.

It sounds like you're feeling a bit overwhelmed with your schoolwork and could use some support in getting more organized. Let's explore some strategies together to help you stay on top of your assignments. To start, can you tell me more about your current system for keeping track of your assignments?

I usually rely on my phone's built-in calendar and notes app to jot down assignments, but they don't provide reliable reminders or help me stay consistent. I've tried Notion before, though it just hasn't clicked for me in keeping everything organized.

It's great that you've already tried some digital tools like your phone's calendar and notes app. While they can be helpful, it sounds like they aren't quite meeting your needs for staying organized. And it's okay if Notion didn't work for youeveryone has different preferences for organization. Let's brainstorm some other strategies that might work better for you. Would you prefer to stick with digital tools, or are you open to trying more traditional methods like planners or bullet journals?

I'm open to trying both digital tools and traditional methods, but I generally prefer digital options since they align better with my daily routine. That said, I'm willing to explore what might work best for keeping my assignments on track.

Since you prefer digital tools, let's discuss some options that might work well for you. Have you considered using apps like Todoist or Trello, which are designed specifically for task management and offer features like reminders, labels, and collaboration? They could help you stay organized and on top of your assignments.

 I've heard of Todoist and Trello but haven't tried them yet. I'm interested in exploring how they can help me manage my assignments better. I appreciate the reminder and collaboration features, which could be useful for group projects as well.

 Great! Here's what you can do next take some time to explore Todoist and Trello, or any other digital tools that catch your attention, and see if they fit your needs and preferences. Remember, it's essential to find a system that works for you, so don't be afraid to try different options. We can discuss your experiences and make adjustments during our next session.

 That sounds like a good plan. I'll start looking into Todoist and Trello, and possibly other apps, to see which one suits me best. Thank you for your guidance on thisI'm feeling more hopeful about getting organized now.

I'll definitely give Todoist and Trello a try to see if their reminder features help with my assignment tracking. Thanks again for the suggestionsI'm excited to find something that fits my routine better.

It's great to hear that you're eager to try out Todoist and Trello, and I'm happy to have been able to provide some helpful suggestions. Remember, finding the right organizational system might take some trial and error, so be patient with yourself during this process. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further assistance in your journey to better organization. Good luck, and I look forward to hearing about your progress in our next session!

I'll make sure to experiment with Todoist and Trello over the next week to test their features for staying on top of assignments. Let me know if there's anything specific I should track in our next session to discuss how it's going.

That's an excellent plan! While you're experimenting with Todoist and Trello, keep track of which features you find most helpful for managing your assignments and staying organized. Also, take note of any challenges or difficulties you encounter, so we can address them together during our next session. This information will help us fine-tune your organizational system and ensure it meets your needs effectively.

I'll make sure to note which features in Todoist and Trello help with my assignment tracking and organization. I'll also jot down any challenges I run into, so we can review them together in our next session.

It sounds like you have a solid plan in place to improve your organization skills. Remember to be patient with yourself as you try out Todoist and Trello, and take note of your progress and any challenges you encounter. I'm here to support you, and I look forward to discussing your experiences in our next session. Feel free to reach out if you need any assistance in the meantime. Take care, and best of luck with your organizational journey!
Thanks for the support. I'll keep testing Todoist and Trello for my assignment reminders and let you know how it goes in our next session.
